import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useHistory, useLocation, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Card, Col, Image, Form, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { addToCart } from '../../actions/cartActions' import Message from '../Message' import Loader from '../Loader' const CartScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams() const location = useLocation() const qty = location.search ? location.seatch.split('=')[1] : 1 console.log(qty) return
Cart
} export default CartScreen
